txt.en: Varthmath can be found in the Gladdenmere.\n\nYou should bring the scales to Varthmath.
Rock-worms can be found on the northern edge of the Gladdenmere.\n\nYou should collect scales from some of the rock-worms you defeat in the Gladdenmere.

The scales of the rock-worms of the Gladdenmere are hard as stone and glisten in the sun. Grimbeorn or others of the Wilderfolk in the Vales of Anduin would greatly prize the scales from any rock-worms you defeat.
Rock-worms can be found on the northern edge of the Gladdenmere.\n\nYou should collect scales from some of the rock-worms you defeat in the Gladdenmere.
Rock-worms of the Gladdenmere are covered in scales that are much prized by the Beornings of the Vales.
'Ah, a fine trophy! Grimbeorn will be proud to own rock-worm scales such as these. You have done very well.'
Bring the rock-worm scales to Varthmath in the Gladdenmere
